overview: "The raw material of this work is the water molecules inside my body.  After repeated severe shoulder pains during my workouts, I got an MRI scan. The cause of the pain is an edema. Yet there is something else beneath that: a cyst inside my bone, which was coincidentally found and has to be removed.  The visuals in this work are composed of the reprocessed MRI scans of my right shoulder that mainly portrays the cyst. The scans, in the larger frame, are translated results of the energy of my molecules transmitted through a magnetic field."
tagline: You Wanna Call This Body Art? Go Ahead.
title: Rainy Monday Morning
